shortDescription: One half of the Dynamic Duo and member of the Teen Titans.

dialogues.message: What do you want to know?
I've noticed things, sure.
But if Hope and Jones don't want me revealing their secrets...
They're trying to do the right thing with this Academy.
Even if they're being bankrolled by someone I wouldn't trust.
Supernova Academy brought me in to help train these new heroes.
They're rough around the edges, but they've got promise.
If they can learn to work together, maybe they can do this.
Who do you think I am?
I'm Tim Drake. Yeah, the smart one.
Probably the best fit to help kick these heroes into shape.
Being a new hero is a lot of work. I hope they're ready.
If you have to ask which Robin I am, you don't deserve to know.
Hey. I'm Robin.
If you have to ask which Robin I am, you don't deserve to know.
Superheroes. A supervillain with an evil plan. Sounds familiar.
That Mask Maker is going down.
Dick's not around right now. Just me.
How can I help?
It's a medium iced latte with a protein booster, a cinnamon swizzle stick...
...and an egg.
Yes, I stir a poached egg into my latte! It's healthy, delicious, and time-efficient!!
Did Ziggy tell you about the egg thing? He never lets me live it down!
There's nothing like bein' the beast!
It makes me feel powerful, sure. But also gives me this deep sense of... peace?
No anxiety, no doubt. Just the raging, perfect storm.
It's the most exhausting and exhilarating sport I've ever done.
Most athletes get to swap on and off the field during the game. Not cheerleaders!
We're out there the whole time, flipping, flying, and cheering at the top of our lungs.
It's hard work, but pepping up the crowd... nothing beats it!
I'm all about the team.
Ready? Okay!
I'm all about the team.
The only way through all of this? Teamwork.
You still up to teach me how to surf?
You're always on beat.
Keepin' it slow, Zig? Take your time!
It's like looking in a big, fleshy mirror.
C'mon, join the cheer squad with me! Let's be backflip buddies!
You gotta teach me how to fight like you!!
You have sad dad energy. Um, but in a good way!
Hi, Hope!
Let me know how I can help. I'm here for the team.
Robin, Raven, Nighthawk... what is it with heroes and bird names?
What would you like to know, hm?
It would be unwise to assume that those unseen are absent, my friend.
I would not abandon those who kept the faith during my... untimely incarceration.
My agents know their assignments. Here, or otherwise.
In the end, as always, I'll get what I want.
I'm not going to lie to you, I'm intrigued by the Zero Point Shard.
A source of power like that carries serious potential.
But I'll tell you what I told Jones and Hope.
There's no point arguing about its eventual fate before we get our hands on it.
Fletcher Kane was always a grasping little poodle, even when we first knew each other.
We were entangled, once, but our perspectives diverged quite violently.
He's always been more bark than bite, poor thing.
I could say I'm sad to see him go, but even I'm not that good of a liar.
I've always done my best work from the SHADOWs.
You already know who I am.
I've always done my best work from the SHADOWs.
Welcome to Utopia City. I may have aided in funding its construction.
Grand plans require unusual allies.
Kane is dealt with. Next, his mask maker.
We have a common goal, despite our differing motives.
No hard feelings, hm? Let's leave the past in the past.
Your recklessness has cost you greatly. My... sympathies.
Remember this, Kane: You lost the moment you came for me.
I know it's not your forte, but let's keep our continued dealings quiet.
You want to be my protégé? I'll give you a chance to earn it.
Happy doing business with you, Dillinger.
And why, little bird, are you watching me so carefully?
I hope you're finding a warmer life, outside of my shadow.
No matter what happens, you and I will always stand side by side.
Keep me apprised of the crew's movements, Brutus.
You're the best at what you do, and I accept nothing less.
Good luck finding a scientific explanation for the golden curse.
Your friend Cassidy shows real potential, if she's willing to ante up.

shortDescription: A fearsome demon warrior, bound by ancient duty.

dialogues.message: No-one on this Island would survive five minutes in the Spirit Realm.
I am The Night Rose. If you haven't heard of me, it's because you are beneath my notice.
No one on this Island would survive five minutes in the Spirit Realm.
I have my freedom. There is little else I could ask for.
I'm now the Tactics instructor for Supernova Academy. It's... interesting.
You're arrogant, Lightrider. I respect it, but tactically it makes you useless.
I will teach you ruthlessness if it's the final thing I do.
Come to class, lizard. I miss the snacks.
You cannot rely wholly on the Beast's brawn. Use your brains.
Morgan, your instincts are good. Stop constantly second-guessing them.
Over-preparation is almost as deadly as under-preparation.
Have you figured out how we will access the Shard?
You helped me secure my freedom. I owe you the greatest of debts.
You helped me secure my freedom. I owe you the greatest of debts.
You helped me secure my freedom. I owe you the greatest of debts.
Robin, I could use your tactical mind on my next team exercise...
Hello, Superman.
What would you like to know?
These 'heroes' will need to work hard to stand any chance against the demons.
They'll need to learn teamwork, tactics, mastery of their powers...
I have my doubts. But I will do my part.
The Spirit Realm is not a place of evil... but there is darkness there.
The Spirit Realm is not a place of evil... but there is darkness there.
The Spirit Realm is not a place of evil... but there is darkness there.
The Spirit Realm is not a place of evil... but there is darkness there.
Hope asked if I would teach at her fledgling Academy. I said yes.
These 'heroes' will need my guidance to deal with threats from the Spirit Realm.
Combat isn't about strength and weakness. It's about tactics.
Mobility, adaptability, leverage. All more important than having the bigger gun.
Teamwork's not really my thing, but... I'm learning.
Hey. I'm Lightrider. The only Supernova worth paying attention to.
Teamwork's not really my thing, but... I'm learning.
You're talking to a real-life superhero. You're welcome.
Look, Synth, you're nice, but we're teammates, not friends.
You need to take things more seriously, Ziggy.
Come on, bring out the beast. I'll still win.
You'll never be a leader if you don't embrace your powers.
We could race, but we both already know I'd win.
The only "tactic" I need is being faster than everyone else.
I want to be the best of the best. Always.
I don't need any touchy-feely advice about teamwork or burnout, thanks.
Lightrider. Remember the name.
Please don't tell me you're here to give me homework.
I guess I have a minute. What's up?
They're fine. Morgan's more powerful than she thinks.
Killswitch is a tryhard, Synthwave's too friendly, Haylee's overconfident.
Killswitch is a tryhard, Synthwave's too friendly, Haylee's overconfident.
In the end, the only one I depend on is myself.
It's good to have a place to practice with my powers, I guess.
Hope's a bit 'teamwork' and 'feelings' oriented for my taste.
And Night Rose is condescending. Does she think she's smarter than me?
Jones, though. He's cool. Love his aesthetic.
It's all in the name: Light. Rider. I ride light. Easy.
Specifically, I surf on waves of pure rezz energy.`
What's 'rezz energy'? I don't know, do I look like a scientist?
Yeah, I'm Morgan Myst. I'm with The Supernovas.
Hey... I'm Morgan.
Yeah, I'm Morgan Myst. I'm with The Supernovas.
I'm one of The Supernovas. The, uh... superhero team?
Oh, just save the world? No pressure...
Oh, just save the world? No pressure...
See you in training, yeah?
Please, no more EDM playlists. PLEASE.
Hey, Zig.
Thanks for the advice, but I don't exactly have an 'inner beast'...
If you want to do any extra training, I'm in.
I'll take any extra training you've got. I have to be strong enough.
How exactly does this whole 'travelling across realities' stuff work?
What are you up to...?
I know you believe in me. That doesn't make me believe in myself.
If you're recruiting for some competing supervillain school or something... No thanks.
What do you even stand for, besides yourself?
No offense, but why are you always skulking around listening to people?
I'll help if I can.
I mean, we've got two famous superheroes, a lieutenant of the Spirit Realm, and two reality-hopping legends.
I feel a little out of my league with them, sometimes.
I really want to buckle down and master these powers, to prove them right.
I want to earn my place beside these other heroes, if I can.
If you tell anyone I said this, I'll deny it, but...
Honestly, every single one of them deserves to be here.
They're hard-working, smart, genuine heroes.
I'll do whatever I can to help them protect this Island.
You're the one who stabilized my shadow proxies, right? Thanks.
Hope said she knew someone who could help. I guess that's you.
She keeps saying I have 'potential'. Whatever that means.
What do you need?
They're a good crew. But we NEED to learn teamwork.
Synth's great at keeping people from burning out, but she lacks focus.
Lightrider's not a team player, Morgan needs a confidence boost. Ziggy's a slacker.
Lightrider's not a team player, Morgan needs a confidence boost. Ziggy's a slacker.
The Academy is everything I've trained my whole life for.
The Night Rose is a tactical genius, Hope fought Doctor Doom...
And Jones, he's seen some stuff. He's a legend.
Plus Robin and THE Superman? I feel like I won the lottery.
My cybernetics got extra juice from a burst of some weird energy.
That plus hard work equals superhero, I guess.
My whole life, I've always worked harder, trained longer, fought to be recognized.
Feels good... and kinda weird... to finally be noticed.
This world doesn't go easy on you, so never go easy on the world.
I'm Killswitch, of The Supernovas. I'm sure you've heard of us.
This world doesn't go easy on you, so never go easy on the world.
You gotta fight for every inch of progress, or you'll end up going in circles. Did that... make sense?
Always follow your dreams... but be ready to beat 'em in one-on-one combat.
You don't have to be the best. Just work the hardest.
They call me a one man army. Go on. Guess why.
Cooperation over competition, LR. We're a TEAM.
I'll sleep when I'm eliminated. 'Til then, I train.
You better not be slacking off on my watch, Zig.
There she is! The BEAST! Or should I say, the GOAT?
Keep training, Morgan. The confidence will come.
Finished my tactics assignment, ma'am. I, uh, went a little over wordcount.
Sir.
Our team's a mess, ma'am, but with training we'll be unstoppable.
You know, Batman's kinda my personal hero.
Oh, uhhh... Hi. Er. Hello, sir.
It's good to be green.
It's Z to the I to the G-G-Y.
It's good to be green.
I hope you're here to relax.
Keep it chill and we won't have any problems.
I've always got time for a fellow board enthusiast.
That lo-fi playlist you made me was so chill... I forgot to even turn it on.
What's up, Eggsy?
Are you SURE you don't like "Morgue-Ann" as a nickname?
You seem tense. Like, all the time.
(gulps nervously) Oh, um... hi...
Your little scarf is looking extra confident today.
HOPE! HOPE! HOPE! HOPE!
What can this lil' lizard do for you?
It's a bit like being you, except you're you and I'm me.
How you feel about being you? That's about how I feel about being me.
We're all just clinging to this sun-drenched rock hurtling through space, man.
Whether you're doin' it as a lizard, or a... you, you're doin' it right.
I wasn't sure I had what it takes to be a hero initially.
But then I started studying with the Night Rose and she's... so cool...
Just looking at her makes me want to be a better lizard.
...Oh, and the other mentors are great too! I like them all EQUALLY. Be cool okay?
Haylee's my best friend in the whole world.
She's friendly, and funny, and weird. All the best people are.
Did you know she puts an entire poached egg in her morning latte? It's "efficient," apparently.
What a freak. I love her.

shortDescription: Iconic renegade on a mission for retribution.

dialogues.message: What do you want?
Hey. Still around, I see. Good.
What do you want?
Vengeance isn't a literal thing. It's a state of mind.
I guess I teach superheroes now. Hmph.
You bring snacks into my class, you pay the Snack Tax.
We're still figuring out if you and the Beast get different grades...
Hope believes in you. That means something.
I wish our plan to save the Shard didn't involve so much... social interaction.
You want more homework? Fine. Go get me a coffee. Black.
I had my doubts about the Academy, but when you're right, you're right.
I get the cool loner thing, but you're part of a TEAM.
You're giving us all a lot to live up to. That's a good thing.
What?
I'll do anything I have to, to keep the Shard safe.
I'll do anything I have to, to keep the Shard safe.
I'll do anything I have to, to keep the Shard safe.
They're green, but they're alright.
We'll kick 'em into shape.
They need a leader, though. Someone to inspire them.
It's not gonna be me, tell you that much.
This whole thing was Hope's idea.
Find promising candidates, fight the Mask Maker, get the Shard back.
Easy-peasy. As if anything ever goes that way.
What's up?
Jones has been pretty grumpy with Kendo.
I think he's looking out for me, since Kendo and I have become closer.
Jones doesn't have to worry. My main focus is finding the Shard.
I can't afford to let anything else distract me.
I'm used to standing up to powerful bullies, but my gut's in a knot.
It just doesn't make sense. Daigo wanted to save the Island. Not... this.
And these Spires, what are they? What is he doing with them?
We're missing something. I know we are.
Still having those visions of doom, yup.
Thankfully not visions of Doom, capital D. Not a reunion I ever want to have.
My visions are vague, but whatever Daigo's doing... we dont want him to succeed.
Or else, this Island might be - again, lower case D - doomed.
This 'saving the world' stuff just gets more and more complicated...
Hey. Good to see you.
Saving the world just keeps getting more complicated. Glad we're getting more allies together.
I still can't believe Jones and I started a school for superheroes.
Be careful of those Spires. They're dangerous.
Teamwork is, uh, kind of central to being part of a superhero team.
Synthwave, remember: keep everything balanced, alright?
So, Ziggy, are you coming to training... at all... this week?
Haylee, you can't cut in line at the cafeteria because "the Beast is hungry".
I believe you are way more capable than you think, Morgan.
I appreciate the respect, but don't call me ma'am.
Night Rose, go a little easier on 'em. These heroes aren't soldiers. Or demons.
I don't like that we still don't know how powerful these Shards are...
Shh. We shouldn't talk too much in public.
Oh, hey. I was hoping I'd get to see you today.
The Island feels... off, right? Those Spires are doing... something.
What happened to 'saving the Island', Daigo? What changed?
You should ask around about Fletcher Kane, Daigo's last 'lieutenant'. Good luck.
Thank you for helping with the heroes. You're everything people said.
We appreciate your help at the Academy. You're a good teacher.

shortDescription: A wandering rōnin with a restless spirit.

dialogues.message: I've never felt more lost.
My blade's at your service, if you need it.
I've never felt more lost.
My brother is a traitor. What do I do now?
Every time I catch my breath, a new crisis hits.
This world moves so fast. I can't keep up.
I'll never forgive you for your betrayal. Never.
Don't be foolish, Jade. Daigo has turned his back on us.
What do you see, when you look at me? A hero, or a failure?
If Hope sees potential in you, you should listen.
Do you think my brother... No, there's no way.
If my brother truly has betrayed us... do what you must.
What is it you want? Money, power, an even fancier coat?
How can I help?
I don't know what the future holds.
Hope and Jones and these Supernovas will confront my brother.
And they'll win, or they won't.
I suspect either will lead to an unhappy ending.
I've always known Daigo was ruthless...
I never thought he was a villain.
I've been a fool. Of course he'd turn his back on us for power.
I've been so naïve. That stops now.
Jade still thinks Daigo will return to us.
After everything she's been through... I understand.
She clings to hope beyond reason. She needs to.
But Daigo has abandoned us. For good.

shortDescription: The Man of Steel, protector of Metropolis.

dialogues.message: I will share what I can.
I have seen many villanous schemes in my time. This is no different.
I wish we knew more about this Mask Maker's aims.
I have heard he was a hero, in his own way, before he fell to darkness.
I hope we can help set him, and this Island, back on the right path.
I have heard he was a hero, in his own way, before he fell to darkness.
I have heard he was a hero, in his own way, before he fell to darkness.
I have heard he was a hero, in his own way, before he fell to darkness.
I have heard he was a hero, in his own way, before he fell to darkness.
Honestly, I'm not sure how I got here.
I believe I fell through one of your "rifts" and found myself on this Island.
While it is accidental, I am happy to help however I can.
Innocent people need protecting.
Pleased to meet you. They call me Superman.
Defending truth, tolerance, and justice. That's what I'm about.
Innocent people need protecting.
The least we can do, in this world, is be kind to one another.
Have we... met...?
What do you need to know?
The Sprites are restless.
Those Spires... I think they're doing something to the Island.
Whatever it is... it's bad.
I don't think Daigo has betrayed us... but Kendo won't LISTEN to me.
That dark presence in the Spirit Realm, it wanted Daigo. It wanted all of us.
What if it's done something to Daigo? What if it's all my fault?
We have to save him. We have to.
This Island is so special. We have to protect it.
Heya. Beautiful day, huh?
This Island is so special. We have to protect it.
All of this is happening because Daigo saved me from the Spirit Realm...
This isn't you. I know it.
I think Daigo needs our help. This isn't like him.
What you're doing, with the heroes, is really great.
Buddy!! How've you been??
I'm glad to see you using your freedom for something good.
The Shard is dangerous, sure... but are you sure you're the one who should protect it?
I'd like to meet those friends of yours someday, Helsie.
Where was Fox Clan when I was taken? At least Daigo DID something.
Daigo isn't like our ancestor. I promise, he's different.
What do you need?
You know, being part of a superhero squad is kind of like being in a band.
Everybody's got their 'thing'. A band made up of all drums or all guitars would get a bit samey, right?
Supernova Academy is amazing! The tech, the campus, the VIBE??
The instructors all have their specialties, too.
Night Rose teaches tactics, Robin helps us train our powers, Hope teaches teamwork...
Jones... Well, I'm sure he's got special projects he's focused on.
I've always had a special connection with music.
Before all this, I was a DJ, musician, the works.
Now, I've got these amazing powers, and I know I gotta do good with them.
After  all, why have superpowers and not try to help people??
It's a beautiful day to be a superhero.
Hey there! You can call me Synthwave.
Doesn't a day like this make you wanna throw on a playlist and dance?
Doesn't a day like this make you wanna dance?
Listen to the rhythm inside you, and you'll know what to do.
Yeah, I'm one of The Supernovas! Saving the Island and all that.
You're super impressive, LR. But remember: you gotta be part of the team, too.
Lookin' good, Zig!
If it isn't the BEAST, my girl Haylee! Bring it in.
You're a hero, Morgan. Just... embrace it!
Wanna play Bugblaster IV in the common room after training? Zig's bringing snacks!
Been working on my formations all morning, ma'am.
I think Morgan could use one of your pep talks. With extra pep.
Oh my. You're a legend!
So, is Batman always that brooding, or does he lighten up sometimes?
